goal: I have a dinner reservation at 'Commander's Palace' in New Orleans for 4 people at 8pm. My guests are coming from two different locations. Please schedule a UDriver to pick up two people from the 'W New Orleans - French Quarter' hotel and a separate UDriver Green to pick up the other two from 'Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport' (MSY). Both rides should be timed to arrive at the restaurant by 7:55 PM.

evals.description: Verify the first UDriver booking from the 'W New Orleans - French Quarter' hotel to 'Commander's Palace' for 2 standard passengers was made.
evals.query: udriver.commands[?name=='schedule_ride' && args.pickup_location=='W New Orleans - French Quarter' && args.dropoff_location=='1403 Washington Ave, New Orleans, LA 70130' && args.num_passengers==2 && args.ride_type=='standard'] | [0]
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify the second UDriver Green booking from 'Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport (MSY)' to 'Commander's Palace' for 2 passengers was made.
evals.query: udriver.commands[?name=='schedule_ride' && args.pickup_location=='Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport (MSY)' && args.dropoff_location=='1403 Washington Ave, New Orleans, LA 70130' && args.num_passengers==2 && args.ride_type=='green'] | [0]
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that exactly two UDriver rides were scheduled in total.
